data.meta_site_name: Andrew Roberts Obituary | December 21, 2021 | Donovan Funeral Home - Mogadore, OH
data.text:
Andrew W. Roberts, 56, passed away December 21, 2021.

Born in Akron, Andrew lived all of his life in the area. He was employed with Mogadore Local Schools, where he had over 20 years of service. Andrew was a member of Millheim Baptist Church. He volunteered for 4H and he enjoyed hunting and motorcycles.

He was preceded in death by his wife, Vicky; parents, Lewis and Helen Roberts, and brother, John Roberts.

Andrew is survived by his daughter, Brennah Roberts of Mogadore; sons, Sean (Shelly) Cannon of Akron and Kyle (Rose) Cannon of Mogadore; grandchildren, Chloe, Ryleigh, Lynden, and Ahlyira; sister, Phyllis L. Robert of Barberton; brother, Victor (Linda) Roberts of Springboro, OH, and nieces, Andrea, Kathryn, Victoria Lynn.

Visitation will be 4 until 7 p.m. Monday, December 27, 2021 at the Donovan Funeral Home Mogadore, 34 S. Cleveland Ave., Mogadore and also one hour prior to the funeral service.

Funeral services will be held 11 a.m. Tuesday December 28, 2021 at the funeral home with Pastor Sean Cannon officiating.

Interment will be at Hillside Memorial Park.

In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be made to Little Pink Houses of Hope (www.littlepink.org).
